content.rendered:
Congratulations to the following staff who were recognized at the June 8, 2023 tenure reception:

Administrative: Danielle Bouton-Wales, Nicholas McPartland, Stacey Moulton, and Scott Singer

Caroline Street: Daniel Casolaro

Geyser Road: Brooke Cannie

Lake Avenue: Cheryl Cooper

High School: Debbie Bazarnick, Christopher Barone, Laurie Brand, Elicia Brockway, Rebecca Goldfischer, and Susan Pienta

Maple Avenue: Clorissa Bonner, John DeLeo, Devan Godfrey, Derrick Legall,  Amy Mohsinger, Misty Salaway, and Elizabeth Woodard
